message: You and your friend Jamie (who has ADHD) are at the grocery store, picking up ingredients for a dinner party.
But there's a problem: Jamie forgot the shopping list at home. They're getting distracted and adding random items to the cart. They freeze when choosing between different products.
This situation happened a lot of times before, and you can't help wondering why.
Let's explore the surroundings and try to find some clues!
For example, you can take a closer look at the shopping cart. Tap the cart for more information
